item.title: How do i add ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

p00n99range:

What you mean? Where I find commands document? Its under client.java where you add that command. Once you go into client.java search if(command then under the last command bracket (}) paste that code.

Actually.
GOOD servers, have the commands seperated from ‘client.java’

only shitty delta has them inside the commands void.

item.title: How do i add ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @pimpoutking pimpoutking
item.description:
@pimpoutking wrote:

[quote=“h3llk03r, post:2, topic:295027”] if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

Add this to your commands[/quote]where i find commands document?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add ::pickup

item.description:
@h3llk03r wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

Add this to your commands
